/*
Parameterization of the chlorophyll-specific absorption coefficient
[m^2/mg], Table 2 in:

Bricaud, A., Babin, M., Morel, A. and Claustre, H., 1995. Variability
in the chlorophyll‚Äêspecific absorption coefficients of natural
phytoplankton: Analysis and parameterization. Journal of Geophysical
Research: Oceans, 100(C7), pp.13321-13332.

a_ph_star = A*<chl>^(-B) [m^2/mg], where <chl> is the chlorophyll
concentration (including divinyl chl a) [mg/m^3]

Column 1: wavelength [nm]
Column 2: A
Column 3: B
*/
